cast.name: 亚历山德拉·佩洛西 Alexandra Pelosi
巴拉克·奥巴马 Barack Obama

director.name: 亚历山德拉·佩洛西 Alexandra Pelosi

this_title: Right America: Feeling Wronged - Some Voices from the Campaign Trail
introduction: On the day Barack Obama was elected the 44th President, more than 58 million voters cast their ballots for John McCain. In the months leading up to this historic election, filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi (HBO's Emmy®-winning "Journeys with George") took a road trip to meet some of the conservative Americans who waited in line for hours to support the GOP ticket, and saw their hopes and dreams evaporate in the wake of that Democratic victory. These voters share their feelings about the changing America in which they live.
chinese_title: Right America: Feeling Wronged - Some Voices from the Campaign Trail
